Astarion BG3 Romance Guide

Where to find Astarion in Baldur's Gate 3?

Astarion can be found southwest of the Roadside Cliff by the Nautiloid shipwreck on the beach. To learn more about Astarion, please visit his page by clicking here.

Astarion Approval Guide in BG3
